title: A Deal with the Devil - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Broken Engagement   Demons   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Friends Become Enemies   Nobles   Oneshot   Revenge   Unrequited Love
author: Aomizu Ryu   青水龍
description: One day, I found a Grimoire in the Royal Library and inadvertently summoned a devil. The devil is said to grant wishes in exchange for souls. I decide to ask the devil to kill my ex-fiancé, who betrayed me and broke off our engagement, and my friend, who slept with him...…. >
